main event: Two witnesses observed an unidentified flying object comparable to a medium star in size and brilliance in Hillcrest Heights, MD on 12/10/52.
interesting points: The object maintained level flight, hovered, then descended., The witnesses are positive it was not an aircraft or a falling star., The observation lasted approximately 35-45 seconds., Radar at Andrews AFB was negative for the object., There was a scheduled radiosonde balloon release at Silver Hill, MD at the time of the sighting.
witness description: Both witnesses were military personnel attached to Andrews AFB.
